dialogues.speaker: Captain Silva
dialogues.text: We're heading to the New World, John. An unexplored territory.

dialogues.speaker: Captain Silva
dialogues.text: Aye, it's not without risks, but no great adventure ever is, lad.

dialogues.speaker: John
dialogues.text: I signed up for this. Ready for the adventure, captain!

dialogues.speaker: Captain Silva
dialogues.text: That's the spirit, John! All hands on deck, we have a New World to discover.
